Articles.Content: Steam users like myself can press shift+tab and open the steam browser. thats nice for when I want to pop on the forums and ask a question here, or check the wiki to see at what altitude dunas atmosphere starts, or anything. Games like Skyrim Auto pause when the shift+tab is pressed. That would be a great feature for ksp since otherwise, shift will throttle up the boosters, which i do accidentally sometimes when trying to consult the forums or wiki.

While I agree there should be a pause function (maybe defaulted to shift+tab, but obviously changeable), what you've described is the reason I always deactivate all engines and lock staging whenever I'm not either about to or actively performing maneuvers.
That would work fine... if throttle was not bound to shift, as it is by default...
i like this idea - it can be annoying alt-tabbing the game to check a YT vid or something and to have the VAB/KSC music blaring over the video.

Steam users like myself can press shift+tab and open the steam browser. thats nice for when I want to pop on the forums and ask a question here, or check the wiki to see at what altitude dunas atmosphere starts, or anything. Games like Skyrim Auto pause when the shift+tab is pressed. That would be a great feature for ksp since otherwise, shift will throttle up the boosters, which i do accidentally sometimes when trying to consult the forums or wiki.

You have to keep in mind that if you hit shift first, before tab, instead of the other way around, it still wouldn't work, when you came back, your throttle would be slightly (on). Best way around it, hit esc to pause. then go about your business.

I play windowed and rarly utilize steam overlay in my game. I understand your problem, but after 600+ hours of play time not once have i actually had trouble with this. The few times i did want to use the steam overlay i just paused the game BEFORE calling it up. I can see how this can create problems, but again after half a thousand hours i still don't have trouble.
I just want Pause to pause the music as well :/
I'd like the music to be paused whenever the game isn't focused; I'd settle for when the game is paused.

People actually use the steam overlay?

It's way slower than just alt tab into an actual browser

I just want Pause to pause the music as well :/

Yes, please.

HTH.
